appsgate.lig.manager.place.impl
Class PlaceManagerImpl

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.manager.place.impl.PlaceManagerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlaceManagerSpec
public class PlaceManagerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlaceManagerSpec

This ApAM component is used to maintain place information for any object in the smart habitat.

Since:
February 26, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
See Also:
PlaceManagerSpec

notifyPlace

private void notifyPlace(java.lang.String placeId,
                         java.lang.String placeName,
                         java.lang.String type)
Use to notify that new place has been created or has changed

Parameters:
placeId - the place identifier
placeName - the user name of this place
type - indicate if this notification is a place creation (0) or an update (1)
